title: Manage Underground Backfill Operations
description: After a stope has been mined out in an underground mine, it must be filled with backfill (e.g., cemented rock fill) to provide ground support.

tasks.description: Confirm that the stope has been fully mined out and is ready for backfilling.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the stope is empty and prepped for filling.

tasks.description: Order a batch of backfill from the surface backfill plant with the required cement content.
tasks.expected_outcome: The backfill plant receives and prepares the order.

tasks.description: Monitor the backfill as it is piped or trucked underground and placed into the empty stope until it is full.
tasks.expected_outcome: The stope is successfully filled, and the volume placed is recorded for reconciliation.
